intro: Tarenna nitidula, commonly known as the smooth tarenna, is a flowering plant native to Madagascar. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves that are smooth and glossy. It produces clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers, followed by small, round berries. Tarenna nitidula is often found in moist, shaded areas within tropical forests.
